text:
Hello Andrey! I did some digging around and apparently there is a feature/experiment now where if you edit the Page URL of a page and set the content slug to

```page-name/[:dynamic-slug]```
You get 4 levels of resolution to that page so for example...

```page-name/test
page-name/level1/level2
page-name/level1/level2/level3
...```
Will all resolve to that page. I'm going to experiment with ReactRouter to see about nuances with SSR and pre-rendering. But I wanted to alert you to this information.
Interesting! I haven't had a chance to implement the hash version yet
<@UAYBXDG4U> let me know if you'd like me to try anything
